name: Joshua Mistal
description: Joshua Mistal is the President of the organization. He is also the Director of Marketing and is currently taking Object-Oriented Programming. He is a member of Solar, Vortex, and Lunar.

name: Karylle Quinto
description: Karylle Quinto is the Vice President and also the Chairperson of Finance. She actively participates in both Solar and Vortex.

name: Jasmin Ivy Fedilo
description: Jasmin Ivy Fedilo serves as the Secretary of the organization and is dedicated to the Solar category.

name: Rachelle Cabrera

name: Sweet Caroline Quiros

name: Alyssa Loque

name: Dave Balbin

name: Lawrence Alferez
